name: Juggernaut Mutagen (Lesser)
desc: After you drink this mutagen, your body becomes thick and sturdy. You exhibit a healthy glow, though you tend to be ponderous and unobservant.
benefit: You gain an item bonus of +1 to Fortitude saves and 5 temporary Hit Points.
drawback: You take a â€“2 penalty to Will saves, Perception checks, and initiative rolls.
